Welcome to bazelgeuse-bot’s documentation!¶

BazelgeuseBot is a discord bot that simulates the bazelgeuse monster from the game Monster Hunter World by playing the monster's iconic scream and will flee the voice channel it is in with the poop emoji.

Current Features:

  • When a user joins a voice channel, BazelgeuseBot will join that channel and execute the scream sound file">

  • When a user enters the command "bazelgeuse scream", BazelgeuseBot will execute the scream sound file and print a message to whatever text channel the user is currently on

  • BazelgeuseBot will react to its name being mentioned in any text channels with a text message in response.

  • Additionally, if the user mentions "bazelgeuse" and "nudes" somewhere in their message, BazelgeuseBot will post a picture of itself.

  • Entering the poop emoji will cause BazelgeuseBot to leave a voice channel
